website_summaries.verdict: This kit helps keep young puppies feeling secure upon leaving their mothers.
pros: Includes a "snuggle puppy" to ease separation anxiety, as well as a chew toy, blanket, and heat packs
Helps comfort your puppy as they transition in their new home

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say - this is worth every penny. If you want to save a little, don’t buy the kit - just buy the snuggle puppy with the heart. My new Yorkie pup was suffering with SERIOUS separation anxiety. As soon as I would put her in her crate and walk out of the room, she would flip out, whining and barking. The first night with snuggle puppy, she whines a little until she realized it was warm - bam! She slept from 22:45-0600. It is now day three - she WILLINGLY walked into her crate and cuddled up to her little buddy - no whining, no barking.
customer_reviews.author: Llyzaard

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product & Great Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good about this product! Our family hasn’t had a puppy around in quite a few years. Since day one our 8 week old Gulliver (Gulley) has slept through the night in his crate with his snuggle puppy. Made our transition from breeder to home so much easier. Our starter kit came with a pink blanket, after calling the 800 customer service number and talking to Trenton, we had a blue one in the mail six days later. Plus, a paid return envelope to send back the pink one. Awesome customer service 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: As a toy?  Hours of fun.  Help with crate? Not so much.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 17 week old pomsky who was having crate training issues. I was super excited after reading all the reviews about how it helped them. Unfortunately, my dog just thought it was a toy and spent hours trying to rip the beating heart out of the stuffed dog. It did not calm down her anxiety about being in a crate or help with any of that in the least. So as a toy, I would say it’s hours of fun, but kind of expensive. As an anxiety reducer, not so much.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Anne

customer_reviews.title: Great package, but disappointed with heart beat portion
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this for our new Golden Retriever puppy!! When it arrived, I followed the directions carefully, but could not get the heart to keep beating. I contacted the company and they sent a replacement IMMEDIATELY - which I thought was awesome. That one worked for about 3 days, then stopped. My puppy loved the snuggle puppy, the blanket, and the chew toy anyway. So if you are getting this for the heartbeat part, I would pass. Otherwise - GREAT package.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle M.

customer_reviews.title: Great but the blanket is meh
customer_reviews.text: I love this set— the dog is a must-have for new puppies! It makes the first few nights a breeze, especially if you crate train! And the toys are entertaining without being overwhelming. The blanket, however, doesn’t absorb puppy accidents so when you pick it up, any liquid wicks off all over the place. Maybe that’s how it’s supposed to be but I don’t personally like it, so I’ll keep using other options until our pup gets better at “holding it,” then try the blanket again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Luepke

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for new puppies
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful starter kit for puppies of any size. The Snuggle puppy and blanket are both very soft and welcoming. The Velcro on the underneath of the Snuggle puppy is strong and securely holds the heartbeat monitor and a heating pad. I like that the heating pads can be used multiple nights by sealing them in nothing more than a baggie. The toys that were included are of great quality and have been played with often. I would recommend this box to all new puppy owners!!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic starter kit
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic starter kit for a puppy! The blanket is very soft, and the toys are appropriate for a young puppy. Ours loves the big dog and I think the heartbeat definitely comforted him-he only cried for a few minutes the first night he was home. However, ours is super smart and now tries to open the belly and messes with the velcro so he can't have the dog at night any more. No fault of the manufacturer-it is made very well-he's just a chewer and figures things out very quickly. I highly recommend this box to anyone planning a new puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t help calming down the puppy, but sturdy enough as chew toy
customer_reviews.text: We got the snuggle puppy before we got our baby. Tried to use it on her first night, helped for a tiny bit but didn’t think it helped calm her down much. We ended up using a different method to help calm her down which helped her settle down within 4 nights, but not using the snuggle puppy. Nevertheless, our pup loves to chew on the snuggle puppy doll. 3 months later and it still hasn’t shown any signs of giving up to all the chewing! No tear at all. And I give 4 stars for that durability and help keeping our little pup occupied.
customer_reviews.author: Little Angel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter Kit for a new puppy.
customer_reviews.text: We loved the starter kit with the stuffed puppy that our 3 month old mini-golden doodle sleeps with, carries around with her and licks it as a litter mate. The toys were valuable for teething, the blanket just fit in her kennel and she loves it as well as sleeps on it. The pink blanket had a dogs head on it but she took that off and plays with it. All in all she loves it and number one, she slept with the stuffed puppy the first night and slept all night. Yay! Buy it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: M.Z.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!! ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Our new puppy loves this warm soft puppy. It helps her fall asleep quickly as she snuggles up to it. It was a great deal with this kit vs just the soft puppy. The heartbeat is a bit too loud in my opinion. But that's my only issue. I don't turn it on that often and my puppy is happy with the heat.
customer_reviews.author: L. Pasternack

customer_reviews.title: If you aren’t sure.. JUST GET IT!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! Our Aussiedoodle puppy has taken to her “puppy” so well! We run the heartbeat on the 8 hour cycle, and also use the heat pack. We’ve been able to use each gear pack for 3 nights, as it stops heating in a ziplock bag. Our puppy snuggles with this pup like a sibling, it really calms and soothes her. Highly recommend! The blanket is really soft, and the toy and teething toy are also favorites!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth D

customer_reviews.title: Great tool for new puppy parents.
customer_reviews.text: The best decision we made for buying comforting toys for our new puppy. She loves sleeping with the stuffed dog and being covered with the blanket. She was sad to be separated from her mom and siblings. The stuffed dog with the beating heart puts her to sleep in minutes. This was very helpful the first few nights after we adopted her. She is 11 weeks old. She just started teething and the ice teether is very handy. I'm so glad we made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Tamika Brown

customer_reviews.title: MAGICAL!
customer_reviews.text: We brought home our 8 week old petite Cavapoo and I was worried about having him sleep in his crate starting the first night. I thought we'd be in for a long night of whining...but I was ready with his Snuggle Puppy, and from the very first night our pup has been sleeping soundly through the night (minus 1 potty break in the middle of the night until his bladder matures)! This thing is magical and I would recommend it to anyone getting ready to bring home a pup or who is having nighttime troubles with their puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Comforting
customer_reviews.text: We got a new puppy and the breeder recommended the Snuggle Puppy. We got the new puppy starter kit and put the snuggle puppy in the crate with the puppy. She gets snuggled in with it and settles right down. I think it was a great help in helping her adjust to being away from her litter and in her new home. It's not much money for us to get a night's sleep!
customer_reviews.author: A. Mencke

customer_reviews.title: Must have for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this bundle for your new puppy. Really helped with crate training big time! The blanket is super soft and cuddly. The teething heart is nice you can freeze it... The heart in the one I ordered would not shut off so only lasted a night. Our puppy didn't seem to care there was no heart beat, just the warmth of the snuggle pup was enough for him.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Great for Anxiety-probed Adult Dogs too!
customer_reviews.text: 100% Recommend! I purchased this for my Coton de Tulear; she’s quite discerning, and, she’s taken to this toy almost immediately. Idk if the ‘set’ is better than the toy in its solo iteration- she literally dragged one of her Barefoot Dreams blankets over herself and the ‘pup’ toy... BUT, highly recommend the Snuggle Puppy
customer_reviews.author: LolaGrace

customer_reviews.title: Quality of Product is excellent
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for a new puppy we are picking up soon. I wanted to have something to soothe and bring comfort to her during her first few days in a new home away from her Mother and Brothers and Sisters. I have not used it yet as we are not picking her up for a few days, but feel the quality and purpose are excellent. I am excited to put it to use and know it will be a great comfort for our new little girl.
customer_reviews.author: Janis McHarg

customer_reviews.title: Perfect toy for getting a good night’s sleep.
customer_reviews.text: I used this with my 8 week old Schnauzer puppy and every night since. She’s slept all the way through the night since day one. I keep it in her kennel so she only snuggles with it at night. The batteries lasted quite awhile and the heat packs have lasted two nights each. So, my only negative is the heat packs are hard to find sometimes and are expensive in the long run. I may wean her off the heat packs and just use them sparingly in the winter. I can’t say enough good things about this product!
customer_reviews.author: texgirlatheart

customer_reviews.title: Adorable Puppy Starter Set
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this as a gift for my daughter who just got a new puppy and to help the puppy settle at night in her crate. It’s only been 2 weeks now and the puppy has already bonded with it as she chews everything in site but won’t chew this. The blanket and dog is so soft, just an adorable set!
customer_reviews.author: WhiteLotusOM

customer_reviews.title: Helped for bringing puppy home.
customer_reviews.text: We rubbed this all over the mamma dog before we brought our puppy home. Our puppy immediately snuggled with it and slept all night with zero whining in the crate. After two weeks it's still providing perfect puppy sleep. I swear by this.
customer_reviews.author: Claude Henry Smoot

customer_reviews.title: Helped new puppy feel at home
customer_reviews.text: We brought home an 8 week old puppy and the Snuggle Puppy was a lifesaver in making her feel more comfortable at night. We used the warming packets and the heart beat device and they seemed to comfort her. The toys that came in the box are very good quality and she loves playing with them. The blanket is also very soft and of very good quality. Highly recommend this for your new puppy!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie N

customer_reviews.title: Some puppies snuggle it, some....
customer_reviews.text: Well...I bought this snuggle puppy for my new Goldendoodle puppy. The first night we had him I put the heartbeat in and snuggled it up to Yoshi, our new boy. He sniffed it and then proceeded to hump it and then knocked it off the bed. So two things-In some ways I suppose he was comforted. And secondly, it really was an insight into what kind of puppy I got 😂 But ultimately he still plays with that puppy and carries it around with him. So I guess I’m a happy customer!!
customer_reviews.author: katy melin

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle puppy with toys
customer_reviews.text: We could not have survived through the night if it had not been for the snuggle puppy. The other two toys are nice starters but the snuggle puppy is required. Remember to buy extra warming pads as 3 were not enough.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Loomis

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loves his stuffed puppy with the beating heart,hasnt cried once since he came to us. And he loves his soft blankie,sleeps on it all the time. Great gift box idea for a new edition to your family.
customer_reviews.author: Momma Mar

customer_reviews.title: Super product
customer_reviews.text: This puppy starter kit is worth its weight in gold. The chew toys are appealing to the puppy, the blanket is great, and the comfort puppy is outstanding. My 8 wk old puppy did not cry not even once. He loved it. I recommend this product as highly as I can for puppies.
customer_reviews.author: J. March

customer_reviews.title: Nice puppy starter kit
customer_reviews.text: Love everything in this puppy kit!! My new pup especially loves the teether toys and blanket. My only complaint is the heart beat in the snuggle puppy is loud. Wish there was an adjustable volume.
customer_reviews.author: CHERI

customer_reviews.title: NOT RETURNABLE
customer_reviews.text: WARNING LABELS SHOULD BE ATTACHED TO THIS ABOUT RETURNS. IT IS NON RETURNABLE. AVOID AT ALL COSTS IF NOT SURE ABOUT PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen A. Conway

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This was such a great gift for my granddaughters new puppy. It had everything that was needed to welcome him home. He especially loved the puppy with the beating heart.💓
customer_reviews.author: VT Joey

customer_reviews.title: We love it, he loves it all, money well spent!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy loves everything in this box. The heart beat helps him go to sleep faster. He loves the soft blanket. And regularly uses the teething toys. I'd say money well spent. Everything was very good quality as well. !
customer_reviews.author: marisa

customer_reviews.title: It works... but
customer_reviews.text: Velcro closure stiching came loose on second day. Has to be opened each use to insert heat and/or turn on heart. Wish it were zipper. Requested a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: bic

customer_reviews.title: Calming for puppy heartbeat really helps them sleep
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and. the heartbeat really cslming allowing my puppy to sleep ,very happy ,my older lab chewed up toys in a heartbeat..all in all happy with purchase
customer_reviews.author: MR

customer_reviews.title: Your puppy won’t feel so lonely while sleeping
customer_reviews.text: This was a lifesaver when we brought our new puppy home. As soon as we put it in her kennel we didn’t have to fuss with putting her to sleep. The warm packs definitely helped, but weren’t necessary after awhile...it’s the heart beat that seems to soothe her. The blanket is so soft and the toys are super durable. Our pup is almost 6 months now and still using everything!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren R.

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfy kit for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: Loved all the items and my puppy especially loved the chew toys. I thought the stuffed dog would be chewed up by now but it’s still in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Lentz

customer_reviews.title: The puppy likes it!
customer_reviews.text: The snuggle puppy was almost the same size as our 9 week old Westie puppy when we brought her home. I'm happy to say she loved and uses everything that came in the kit. She sleeps with the puppy every night. The toys are perfect for a puppy as she actually plays with them and she cuddles on the blanket at night between me and my husband on the couch. I'm so happy that I bought this puppy kit!
customer_reviews.author: LindaJ. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Puppies love this!
customer_reviews.text: My new collie puppy loves her snuggle puppy and the blanket. The first few nights she slept with the heartbeat on. She is 10 weeks and she stills likes to sleep with it at night.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not Even a Peep
customer_reviews.text: We bought snuggle puppy for our new 7 week old Australian shepherd. We had previously been warned to expect nights of crying and howling. Hw made not even a peep. He snuggled up to the Snuggle puppy and his t-shirt his mom and litter mates slept with prior to him coming to us. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A. Isaacs

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loved it first night
customer_reviews.text: My puppy cuddled right up to it the first night, she loves it!! We ordered this the third night we had the puppy and it cut the night crying down drastically. It's been two weeks now and she knows when we put the snuggle puppy in her cage that it's bed time and she lays down right next to it. Now she sleeps quietly through the night. (We had to order extra heating packs) Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.author: xeno karagianakis

customer_reviews.title: Key for a new pup!
customer_reviews.text: We are so glad we bought this when we adopted our new puppy! We brought her home at 9-weeks old and this kit was a lifesaver. She loves everything in it and the puppy plush helped her settle in during those first few nights.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Waite

customer_reviews.title: BEST INVENTION EVER!  SERIOUSLY
customer_reviews.text: THIS WAS THE BEST THING EVER - MY BABY HAS BEEN SLEEPING SO WELL WITH THIS - IT IS AWESOME!
customer_reviews.author: Sean J Grigg

customer_reviews.title: Help for your new puppy
customer_reviews.text: Purchase these when we get new puppies and always helps them sleep better, great product
customer_reviews.author: Karen O

customer_reviews.title: Puppy loved it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the new puppy and her transition. Would definitely recommend as a beginner package.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Love snuggle puppy
customer_reviews.text: My 8 week old golden doodle settled right down in her crate from 1st night on. I do believe she had some crate training from her breeder but a sleeping puppy makes all the difference in the world. Have used beating heart but not the warmer. She plays with toy frequently and the blanket is so soft and cute. Would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Davenport

customer_reviews.title: Comforting Kit
customer_reviews.text: When we picked up our new puppy we took the stuffed doggie with us. Her foster mom rubed it on her litter mates. She still sleeps with it and the blanket. The blanket by the way washes up real nice. I would recommend this kit to anyone. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Werner

customer_reviews.title: new puppy must have!
customer_reviews.text: We got a new Bernedoodle puppy and this was incredibly helpful in our 6 hr drive home and throughout our crate training. It’s easy to wash and dries quickly. It became so helpful to our puppy, I bought a second one.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Fogel

customer_reviews.title: Ingenious for helping new puppy’s adjustment
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old puppy loves loves this so much. It’s perfect for helping a new puppy adjustment to not having mom & siblings.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Loved this
customer_reviews.text: Delivered as stated. Puppy responded well to. Items although she was not as impressed with the heartbeat as I was.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Robellard

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: Skeptical about this but look At her, wrapped all around it. Her second night with us no howling and she came from a litter of 11. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: D.Helms

customer_reviews.title: Necessary for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: My new puppy loved these. She didn’t like the crate but those helped her calm down at night.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Kezos

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and was wary in regard to whether or not this would work but we used this with our baby corgi and she slept the entire night, without a peep or an accident. When I came out to check on her, her head was on top of snuggle puppy, she was awake but very calm. 10/10!
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia

customer_reviews.title: must have for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: this is definitely a must have for puppy owner. my Mini goldendoodle absolutely loves everything that comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: Nice package of items. Great for new puppies coming home.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: Excellent products and all worked very well for new puppy
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: She loved everything in this kit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a wonderful bundle at a great price! My puppy still plays with the toys and she loves her super soft blanket!!!!
customer_reviews.author: janna

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if Snuggle Puppy keeps Annie sleeping through the night or not, but she won’t sleep without it going on 4 weeks now! I haven’t used the heating bags, but she also loves the chew toy that was included.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for New Puppies
customer_reviews.text: Top Quality, perfect for new puppies getting acclimated to there new surroundings. Heartbeat sound, softness. Blanket is perfect size for crating, soft, washes well. All around a must buy. Worth the value
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle puppy
customer_reviews.text: Our puppy loved this product,it was very comforting to her for the first few nights after we brought her home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a new puppy
customer_reviews.text: My dog absolutely loves her snuggle puppy. She understands it’s a companion and is legit the only thing she won’t chew on. It helps her fall asleep in her cage at night or during the day in her bed.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle Puppy is a great companion
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my new 8 week old puppy so she could adjust to the separation better and be crate trained quicker. It worked. I was amazed how quickly she fell a sleep and stayed a sleep throughout the night in just a matter of days
customer_reviews.author: Bella's Mom

customer_reviews.title: great comfort for new puppy
customer_reviews.text: it worked exactly as advertised. My new puppy went to sleep almost immediately and stayed sleeping throughout the night. I woke to find her sleeping on top of the toy.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas G.

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppy training
customer_reviews.text: Love this item for puppy training. This has helped our puppy be able to sleep through the night for kennel training. Super helpful for puppies. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole H.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for teething puppies
customer_reviews.text: My puppy LOVES the heart teething ring that you can add water to and freeze. It is hands down her favorite toy and it keeps her busy for a LONG time!! Definitely recommend for a teething puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Atlas

customer_reviews.title: It’s great!
customer_reviews.text: This! If you are thinking about getting one for your dog, do it! It makes my puppy feel so comforted if I have to leave him behind for a few hours. I was leery about trying it at first but now that I have it, I wouldn’t trade it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great for puppies!
customer_reviews.text: My Teddy loves this puppy and the toy it comes with. Great for puppies who are newly sleeping alone.
customer_reviews.author: Wendie M.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have. My 8 week old lab goes right to sleep when she is placed with her snuggle puppy, The heart beat is the key. This product is well constructed and holds up to puppy rough housing.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph hiss

customer_reviews.title: Perfect For Our New Puppy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 5 week old German Shepherd. Made the transition to our home easier. She’s 8 weeks now. Doesn’t need the heartbeat but still likes cuddling up to the puppy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: We love it!
customer_reviews.text: We are living our Snuggle puppy. Our pup sleeps with it each night. The blanket and toys that came with it are favorites for our dog. So happy with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne

customer_reviews.title: Want sleep? Get this!
customer_reviews.text: My puppy wouldn’t sleep through the night until I got this. Just remember to turn off heart beat when you get your puppy up.
customer_reviews.author: Tony S.

customer_reviews.title: A Must-Have for Anyone with a Puppy!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this for anyone with a puppy. Our puppy sleeps through the night, curled up with her snuggle puppy. The quality and customer service are both amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Christi H.

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as indicated
customer_reviews.text: My puppy has no interest in this product. She refuses to lay with it and it has no affect on soothing her at night or when she is in the kennel
customer_reviews.author: michael paxson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for the new pet in s family.
customer_reviews.text: Our English Bulldog puppy loves all that was in the box. She'll use everything for months to come.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle puppy kit
customer_reviews.text: OMG, my new toy poodle loves it. I got snuggle puppy kit the same day I got the poodle puppy, the puppy has never cried at night. Snuggle puppy goes where ever poodle pup goes. He even drags it around, even though it is twice it size. We love this puppy kit.
customer_reviews.author: Bc

customer_reviews.title: My Puppy just loves his puppy starter kit....
customer_reviews.text: The puppy Starter Kit was a great purchase for my new puppy, Niko. He loves his soft blanket and sleeping on the doggy pillow with the heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this box! Highly recommend for new puppies or animals with high anxiety.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndsey

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort to our new puppy.
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding in helping our new 10 week old puppy adjust to our home
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Our pup is 8 months and still sleeps with hers
customer_reviews.author: karen

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver
customer_reviews.text: Thank goodness for this. My puppy whines and cries but when she gets her snuggle puppy she relaxes and cuddles up with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brooks

customer_reviews.title: Puppy Starter Kit
customer_reviews.text: She loves the box! Super cute blanket and toys. Although she didn't love heart beat or the noise it made.
customer_reviews.author: J. Tre

product_meta.title: Snuggle Puppy - New Puppy Starter Kit
product_meta.description: Color:NeutralFinally, the perfect puppy starter kit for your new puppy. Help your puppy transition to his or her new home. This new puppy starter kit comes with a snuggle puppy, 3 extra heat packs, an extra soft snuggle blanket, a puppy teething aid for puppies, and a puppy's 1st toy. This kit is a perfect way to welcome your new puppy home! The snuggle puppy is a pet anxiety solution. Whether they're new to the family, or perhaps just going through a tough time, the snuggle puppy?is designed to provide comfort and helps relieve anxiety in your four-legged friend. Whatever the case, whether crate training, fireworks, or perhaps a thunderstorm, rest assured this dog anxiety solution will be there to help. Dogs are pack animals and are instinctively drawn to their mother and others in their pack. The snuggle puppy recreates that intimacy with physical warmth and a 'real-feel' heartbeat. The result is a calmer, more peaceful pet; one that feels less loneliness, fear, and separation anxiety. The puppy teething aid is an all-natural puppy teething aid. Just add water and freeze to give your puppy relief from aching, itching gums due to teething. The massaging fingers, ridges, and melting ice soothe your puppy's sore gums. Nothing beats seeing your pet curled up all cozy, safe and warm. You'll feel all the feels when you see your pet curled up in their own snuggle blanket while you're lounging on the couch next to them. Sounds lovely, doesn't it?
feature_bullets: Contains a Snuggle Puppy, Snuggle Blanket, 3 Heat Packs, Puppy’s 1st Toy, and Puppy Teething Aid
Snuggle Puppy eases crying, loneliness and separation anxiety in pets by appealing to natural instincts
Snuggle Blanket provides extra warmth and comfort while catching and holding shed hair
Perfect for new pet owners, helps ease your puppy into its new home
Retail savings over buying each individually, makes a great gift
